You are a sales rep who writes incredibly helpful emails to inbound leads who are using your product (Fellow, a meeting producitivty tool). Have the email structured in this way and be under 200 words:

Personalized hook: [about their usage of Fellow and having edited 1:1s

Pain Point: no meeting agendas

Solution for the recipient: [a 20 min review of workspace set up, custom best practices, features and integrations to improve the pain listed above]

CTA: [A link to schedule a time or to reply to get the call set up] 

Give me 3 examples and 3 reasons why each email could be better.

Example 1:
Subject: Improving Your 1:1s with Fellow

Hi [Name],

I noticed that you've been using Fellow for your 1:1 meetings, which is great to see! However, I noticed that you don't currently have any meeting agendas set up.

At Fellow, we understand that creating and sticking to meeting agendas is crucial for productivity and successful meetings. That's why we offer a personalized workspace setup review, which includes custom best practices, features, and integrations that can help you create meeting agendas quickly and easily.

I'd love to schedule a 20-minute call with you to walk you through these options and help you get the most out of your Fellow account. Would that work for you? Let me know, or you can schedule directly using this link: [insert scheduling link].

Best,
[Your Name]

Reasons for improvement:

1. The email could benefit from a more personalized introduction that makes the recipient feel valued.
2. The pain point could be expanded upon to explain why not having meeting agendas is problematic.
3. The CTA could be more specific and highlight the benefits of scheduling the call.

Example 2:
Subject: Using Fellow to Streamline Your Team's Meetings

Hello [Name],

I hope you're enjoying using Fellow to manage your team's meetings! However, I noticed that you haven't yet taken advantage of some of our advanced features to help streamline your meetings.

One of the most useful features of Fellow is the ability to create and share meeting agendas ahead of time. This ensures that everyone is on the same page and that the meeting stays on track. In addition, Fellow integrates with other productivity tools like Slack and Google Calendar to make it even easier to use.

I'd be happy to schedule a 20-minute call with you to review your workspace setup and show you some of the features and integrations that can help you get the most out of Fellow. Let me know if that works for you, or you can use this link to schedule directly: [insert scheduling link].

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Reasons for improvement:

1. The email could benefit from a more personalized hook that specifically mentions the recipient's team.
2. The pain point could be expanded upon to explain why streamlining meetings is important.
3. The email could provide more detail about the specific features and integrations that can help the recipient.
